Graffeo)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc7fd9d50e71a0011558878?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx13/cdn3@2020_3/2020/12/03/02-49-02-582_72a08c3573a3044f.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn3@2020_2/2020/12/03/02-49-00-176_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=R-33Q_Jm8kc:gPD38w5ddgk:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx24/cdn67@2020_6/2020/12/03/02-49-00-665_5bbf494f286305b5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=R-33Q_Jm8kc:gPD38w5ddgk:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx22/cdn88@2020_2/2020/12/03/02-48-52-963_67d4d6e0f44795cb.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn99@2020_3/2020/12/03/02-48-56-007_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=R-33Q_Jm8kc:gPD38w5ddgk:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx15/cdn4@2020_4/2020/12/03/02-48-54-219_872fa71df2476d0d.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/R-33Q_Jm8kc":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx2/cdn7@2020_5/2020/12/03/02-48-50-110_c617adfe6b0ac73c.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606963710043},{"createdTime":"2020-12-03 10:48:29","updatedTime":"2020-12-03 10:48:29","title":"Merck sells its investment stake in Moderna after recording a 'substantial' gain","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/merck-sells-investment-stake-in-moderna-after-recording-substantial-gain-2020-12","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc7d4b0037cbd00186135cf?format=jpeg\" alt=\"The Merck logo is seen at a gate to the Merck &#38; Co campus in Linden, New Jersey, U.S., July 12, 2018. REUTERS/Brendan McDermid\" height=\"1750\" width=\"3500\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The Merck logo is seen at a gate to the Merck &#38; Co campus in Linden, New Jersey\n<p class=\"copyright\">Reuters</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul><li><strong>Following an eye-popping rally in 2020, Merck said on Wednesday that it sold its entire stake in Moderna.</strong></li><li><strong>Merck, which is collaborating with Moderna on potential cancer treatments, invested in Moderna in 2015 and 2018.</strong></li><li><strong>Merck said it recorded a \"substantial gain\" in its investment in Moderna, and still holds indirect exposure to Moderna through its investments in venture funds.</strong></li><li><strong>Shares of Moderna initially traded lower on the news, but have since recovered in Wednesday trades.</strong></li><li><strong><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingest?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestm=ingest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</strong></li></ul><hr><p>One investor cashing in on <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/mrna-stock\">Moderna's</a> meteoric rise in 2020 is <a href=\"https://markets.businessinsider.com/stocks/mrk-stock\">Merck</a>, the New Jersey-based pharmaceutical giant.</p><p>In <a href=\"https://www.merck.com/news/merck-announces-sale-of-its-direct-equity-investment-in-moderna/\">a statement on Wednesday</a>, Merck said it sold its equity stake in Moderna in the first half of the fourth quarter, adding that it achieved a \"substantial gain\" on its holdings.</p><p>Shares of Moderna traded down as much as 9% in early morning trades, but have since recovered as of Wednesday afternoon.</p><p>Merck initially invested $50 million in Moderna before it was public in 2015, and subsequently invested $125 million in the company in 2018. Moderna went public in late 2018.</p><p>Year-to-date through the start of the fourth quarter, shares of Moderna were up 255%. The stock has continued to rally in the fourth quarter, with Moderna hitting an all-time high of $178.50 in Tuesday's trading session, representing year-to-date gains as high as 813%.&#160;</p><p><em><strong>Read more:</strong>&#160;<a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/stock-picks-18-companies-factor-etfs-blackrock-overweight-momentum-size-2020-12?utm_source=markets&utm_medium=ingestgest\" target=\"_blank\" rel=\"noopener\" data-analytics-position=\"2\" data-analytics-module=\"\">BlackRock is channeling more cash to high-momentum and relatively small stocks as the economy recovers. These are the 20 companies they're earmarking the most money for.</a></em></p><p>Merck said it still holds indirect exposure to Moderna's equity through venture funds.&#160;</p><p>Merck did not specify how much it booked in profits on the investment. The company said it will record the gain in the \"other income\" section of its income statement when it reports earnings.</p><p>The two biotech companies continue to collaborate on potential cancer vaccine treatments.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc7e960037cbd0018613671?format=jpeg\" alt=\"mrna chart.JPG\" height=\"641\" width=\"836\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>\n<p class=\"copyright\">Markets Insider</p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><div class=\"read-original\">Read the original article on <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:yIl2AUoC8zA\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:qj6IDK7rITs\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs\" border=\"0\"></img></a> <a href=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?a=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:gIN9vFwOqvQ\"><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:gIN9vFwOqvQ\" border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ju9twUTIqBs\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 02 Dec 2020 21:00:54 +0000","feedId":22,"bgimg":"https://i.insider.com/5fc7d4c650e71a001155872b?format=jpeg","linkMd5":"24edc1624c5e26df0bfd4f877df7a844","bgimgJsdelivr":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx11/cdn51@2020_5/2020/12/03/02-48-48-947_53492c91faaf0ffe.webp","destWidth":3066,"destHeight":2300,"sourceBytes":628906,"destBytes":628906,"author":"mfox@businessinsider.com (Matthew Fox)","articleImgCdnMap":{"https://i.insider.com/5fc7d4b0037cbd00186135cf?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx18/cdn63@2020_5/2020/12/03/02-48-55-660_ec72893b6d3effbc.webp","https://i.insider.com/5fc7e960037cbd0018613671?format=jpeg":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx25/cdn20@2020_1/2020/12/03/02-48-52-206_b0ed933c887b6dd4.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=yIl2AUoC8zA":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx30/cdn3@2020_2/2020/12/03/02-49-00-176_cc3ef43fc8ff5801.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:F7zBnMyn0Lo":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx1/cdn60@2020_2/2020/12/03/02-48-57-640_2abfcd7b89e49fbd.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:V_sGLiPBpWU":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx27/cdn19@2020_3/2020/12/03/02-49-01-057_7e6b14940e266697.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?d=qj6IDK7rITs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx21/cdn99@2020_3/2020/12/03/02-48-56-007_740defb435ea442b.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~ff/businessinsider?i=ju9twUTIqBs:udDbfAtWQnM:gIN9vFwOqvQ":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx4/cdn32@2020_5/2020/12/03/02-48-51-364_6392a41a54cbf9e5.webp","http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/ju9twUTIqBs":"https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/myreaderx/cdn72@2020_6/2020/12/03/02-48-49-888_679d8724de39eb21.webp"},"publishedOrCreatedDate":1606963709994},{"createdTime":"2020-12-03 10:48:30","updatedTime":"2020-12-03 10:48:30","title":"Rare video takes you into a 'scallywag bunker' that was Britain's last line of defense against a Nazi invasion","link":"https://www.businessinsider.com/inside-bunker-britain-last-line-of-defense-against-nazi-invasion-2020-12","description":"<figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc7e51250e71a001155879d?format=jpeg\" alt=\"UK Scallywag bunker\" height=\"984\" width=\"1970\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>The entrance to a recently discovered underground bunker belonging to World War II-era British Auxiliary Units, known as &#34;Scallywags.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XDRqmNtKms&#38;feature=youtu.be\" target=\"_blank\">The Conversation/YouTube</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><ul class=\"summary-list\">\n<li>As Nazi forces massed along the French coast in 1940, residents of UK prepared for what they expected to be a final stand after a German invasion.</li>\n<li>Those British individuals, many of them with intimate knowledge of the countryside, hid out in bunkers in order to conduct lethal operations behind what may have soon been enemy lines.</li>\n<li>Eighty years later, those \"Scallywag Bunkers,\" as they're known, remain scattered across the British countryside, a reminder of a much more perilous time.</li>\n<li><a href=\"https://www.businessinsider.com/?hprecirc-bullet\">Visit Business Insider's homepage for more stories</a>.</li>\n</ul><p>Eighty years ago, as Nazi Germany's military might amassed along the French coast, small groups of highly trained British killers bade farewell to their families and made their way underground for what could well have been their last, lethal mission.</p><p>Known as \"scallywags\", these individuals — many of them gamekeepers, landowners and poachers with an intimate knowledge of the rural areas in which they would operate — were members of Britain's clandestine World War II \"Auxillary Units.\"</p><p>And their mission, in the event of a <a href=\"http://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/wwtwo/invasion_ww2_01.shtml\">Nazi invasion</a> of the UK, was to operate behind enemy lines — and kill, harry and sabotage.</p><figure>\n\t<img src=\"https://i.insider.com/5fc7e4c950e71a001155879b?format=jpeg\" alt=\"UK Scallywag bunker\" height=\"1042\" width=\"1692\" charset=\"\">\n<figcaption>Inside a recently discovered underground bunker belonging to British World War II Auxiliary Units, known as &#34;Scallywags.&#34;\n<p class=\"copyright\"><a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XDRqmNtKms&#38;feature=youtu.be\" target=\"_blank\">The Conversation/YouTube</a></p>\n</figcaption>\n</figure><p>In 1940, a German invasion — dubbed <a href=\"http://www.bbc.co.uk/history/worldwars/wwtwo/invasion_ww2_01.shtml\">Unternehmen Seelöwe (Operation Sealion)</a> — was a very real threat.</p><p>The plan was for the UK's armed forces to protect London and Britain's industrial heartlands behind the so-called <a href=\"http://www.pillbox-study-group.org.uk/uk-defence-locations/\">General Headquarters (GHQ) Line</a>. But large swaths of eastern England would have essentially been sacrificed to the invaders, leaving just the brave volunteers of the Auxiliary Units there to hinder the German advance.</p><p>As we wrote in a recent <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/uncovered-the-ww2-scallywag-bunkers-that-were-britains-last-ditch-line-of-defence-140031\">article</a>, the story of these individuals has long remained a closely guarded secret. And despite facing a life expectancy of just 12 days, these \"scallywags\" would have received no medals and no official recognition.</p><p>Indeed, the only comfort they would have found in their hidden underground bunkers would have been their rum ration, each other — and the knowledge that they were playing a vital role as Britain's last-ditch line of defence.</p><h2>Uncovered</h2><iframe width=\"560\" height=\"315\" src=\"https://www.youtube.com/embed/0XDRqmNtKms\" frameborder=\"0\" allowfullscreen></iframe><p>First-hand accounts of these extraordinary individuals died with the last member of the group. But their legacy lives on, hidden within the spartan underground bunkers they would have conducted their lethal work from.</p><p>And while almost all of these remote hideouts remain lost in the British countryside, <a href=\"https://www.tandfonline.com/doi/abs/10.1080/15740773.2020.1822102?journalCode=yjca20\">we recently uncovered</a> one in Suffolk — complete with some some of the precious artefacts its occupiers left behind.</p><p>Accessed through a small hole in the forest floor, this \"Scallywag bunker\" offers a tantalising glimpse of a lost era, when just a handful of individuals were potentially all that stood in the way of a successful Nazi invasion of Britain. And now we can take you with us <a href=\"https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0XDRqmNtKms\">as we explore it</a> …</p><p><em><a href=\"https://theconversation.com/profiles/peter-doyle-391466\">Peter Doyle</a>, Head of Research Environment, <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/institutions/london-south-bank-university-909\">London South Bank University</a>; <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/profiles/jamie-pringle-378031\">Jamie Pringle</a>, Senior Lecturer in Geosciences, <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/institutions/keele-university-1012\">Keele University</a>, and <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/profiles/kristopher-wisniewski-1072906\">Kristopher Wisniewski</a>, Geoforensic Researcher (Staffordshire University) and Lecturer in Chemistry (Keele University), <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/institutions/staffordshire-university-1381\">Staffordshire University</a></em></p><p><em>This article is republished from <a href=\"https://theconversation.com\">The Conversation</a> under a Creative Commons license. Read the <a href=\"https://theconversation.com/video-unique-footage-of-secret-ww2-scallywag-bunkers-that-were-britains-lethal-last-line-of-defence-149964\">original article</a>.</em></p><div border=\"0\"></img></a>\n</div><img src=\"http://feeds.feedburner.com/~r/businessinsider/~4/lwWhJxGhN7M\" height=\"1\" width=\"1\" alt=\"\"/>","descriptionType":"html","publishedDate":"Wed, 02 Dec 2020 19:31:45
